description: This table contains bundled episode history for Hospital Billing temporary transactions.

columns.name: HTT_ID
columns.description: The unique identifier for the transaction record.

columns.name: LINE
columns.description: The line number for the information associated with this record. Multiple pieces of information can be associated with this record.

columns.name: HTT_LINE
columns.description: Holds the line number in the charge data related group that this line corresponds to.

columns.name: ACTION_DTTM
columns.description: The date and time that this transaction was linked/unlinked to the bundled episode.

columns.name: EPISODE_ID
columns.description: Holds bundled episode records linked to this transaction.

columns.name: ACTION_C_NAME
columns.description:
The current state of this transaction and episode, whether it is linked or unlinked.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


Link


Unlink

columns.name: SOURCE_C_NAME
columns.description:
The source of the link or unlink of this bundled episode to this transaction.


May contain organization-specific values: No


 Category Entries: 


User


Visit Association


Auto Link


Auto Creation


Auto Link Via Transform


Auto Link Via Association


Auto Removal

columns.name: USER_ID
columns.description: The user who performed the link or unlink of this episode to the transaction line.
